attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.title: Very scary app
attributes.review: This app is horribly scary. Made me want to cry. Makes children cry I repeat makes children cry. Pls delete this app from the App Store it’s very scary. Thank you.

attributes.title: Very Racist App
attributes.review: This app pushes the racist, fascist, white supremacy agenda. I do not encourage anyone to review this app higher than a 1star. i would rate this 0 stars if i could. very terrible app.

attributes.title: Nonono
attributes.review:
This is an awful app. It took 2 weeks to download, and it hacked my phone and deleted all my contacts, I hate is. 

          Sincerely, Angry!
